item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普围绕 "报复 "所发表的黑暗言论是其 2024 年竞选活动的焦点，但如果他当选，能否将其变为现实？
item.description:
Donald Trump's dark rhetoric around "retribution" is a focal point of his 2024 campaign, but could he make it a reality if elected? https://t.co/8kaF0wsAf5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 据当局称，一名 30 岁的妇女在加利福尼亚沿海地区进行一日徒步旅行，现已失踪四天。
item.description:
A 30-year-old woman who went on a day-trip hike in coastal California has now been missing for four days, according to authorities. https://t.co/ezhKTfkaXk

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 田纳西州东北部的一个湖边，一位渔民在钓到一条 3 到 4 英尺长的鳄鱼后，惊喜地发现自己的鱼线已经到了尽头。
item.description:
A fisherman at a lake in northeast Tennessee caught a surprise at the end of his line when he pulled up a 3- to 4-foot long alligator. https://t.co/Qd45HSUBZ7

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 根据最新研究，全球气温上升可能对农业和全球通货膨胀造成的压力将可能导致食品价格进一步上涨。
item.description:
The strain that rising global temperatures could have on the agriculture industry and inflation around the world will likely cause food prices to increase even more, according to new research. https://t.co/XSCLGaOWwg

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 研究表明，由于气候变化，北美典型的过敏季节变得更长、更剧烈。
item.description:
Typical allergy seasons are getting longer and more intense in North America because of climate change, research shows. https://t.co/tOwLxmzp1M

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据俄罗斯通讯社报道，俄罗斯联邦安全局局长已通知普京，莫斯科音乐会恐怖袭击事件中的四名枪手已在俄罗斯与乌克兰接壤的西部边境附近全部被捕：
item.description:
BREAKING: The head of Russia’s FSB has reportedly informed Putin that all four gunmen from the Moscow concert terror attack have been arrested near Russia's western border with Ukraine, Russian news agencies report.

Read more: https://t.co/gb6oPS6UI6 pic.twitter.com/ZTpKipod74

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 一个外科小组周四表示，它已进行了世界上首次将基因编辑猪肾移植到活人体内的手术。
item.description:
A surgical team said Thursday it has conducted the world's first genetically edited pig kidney transplant into a living human. https://t.co/WBS3YnZPBG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 据研究人员称，美国石油和天然气生产排放的甲烷比以前想象的要多，每年造成的环境损害高达数十亿美元。
item.description:
The U.S. is emitting more methane from oil and gas production than previously thought – and it's causing billions of dollars in environmental damage per year, according to researchers. https://t.co/S8t8PdnMN7

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 根据教科文组织的报告，约有 22 亿人无法获得安全管理的饮用水，35 亿人无法获得安全管理的卫生设施。
item.description:
About 2.2 billion people live without access to safely managed drinking water and 3.5 billion people lack access to safely managed sanitation, according to UNESCO report. https://t.co/u28IkWcwlu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 一项新的分析显示，目前在美国买房要比租房贵得多，预计至少在未来五年内，房地产市场都将如此。
item.description:
Buying a house in the U.S. is considerably more expensive than renting right now, and the real estate market is expected to stay that way for at least the next five years, according to a new analysis. https://t.co/63ZKW2cL8k

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 西班牙大帆船 "圣何塞 "号的沉船价值约为 170 亿美元，据有关官员称，该沉船最快将于 4 月份打捞出水。
item.description:
The estimated $17 billion shipwreck of the Spanish galleon ship San José is set to be recovered as soon as April, according to officials — centuries after it sank and nearly a decade after it was initially discovered. https://t.co/DziBzlv9Ry

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 最近，一种被称为 "鲸龙 "的重甲古鳄鱼祖先物种的化石被鉴定出来，让我们得以一窥 2.15 亿年前的世界。
item.description:
The recent identification of fossils from a heavily armored ancient crocodile ancestor species, known as aetosaurs, provides a glimpse into our world 215 million years ago. https://t.co/cUC3U57OR5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 帕蒂-博伊德（Pattie Boyd）是 "摇摆 60 年代 "的核心人物，她的大量信件、照片和其他物品的在线拍卖已于周五结束，可以说拍卖结果超出了所有人的预期。
item.description:
The online auction of a trove of letters, photos and other items that Pattie Boyd, who was at the heart of the Swinging 60s, concluded Friday — and it's safe to say that it really surpassed all expectations. https://t.co/U3aQfpgI8l

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 根据盖洛普及其合作伙伴发布的《2024 年世界幸福报告》，美国的排名下降了 8 位，不再是世界上最幸福的 20 个国家之一。
item.description:
The U.S. has fallen eight spots and is no longer in the top 20 happiest countries in the world, according to the 2024 World Happiness Report released by Gallup and its partners. https://t.co/G5nVto57An

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：在周五的开奖中没有宣布中奖者之后，百万大奖的奖金已升至约 11 亿美元。
item.description:

item.title: 据一个追踪执法人员自杀事件的非营利组织发布的报告称，在七年时间里，全国有 1200 多名公共安全人员死于自杀。
item.description:
More than 1,200 of the nation's public safety personnel died by suicide over a seven-year period, according to a report released by a nonprofit organization that tracks law enforcement suicides. https://t.co/PHmnMAcBKd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 几十年来，汽车已经变得越来越安全，但仍有许多工作要做，而女性碰撞假人的开发可能会确保美国妇女的更大安全。
item.description:

item.title: 内布拉斯加州的护士收养了她们在新生儿重症监护室照顾过的女婴："如果这是你的心愿，我会说去做吧，不要逃避，因为有[很多]孩子需要收养"。
item.description:
Nebraska nurses adopt baby girl they cared for in the NICU: "If it's something that's on your heart, I would say go for it and don't steer away, because there are [many] kids that need adoption." https://t.co/3rvg6alDoT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 一位母亲的四胞胎新生儿重症监护病房住院账单总额超过 400 万美元，引发了关于美国医疗费用高昂的讨论。
item.description:
A mom's hospital bill for her quadruplets' neonatal intensive care unit stay, totaling over $4 million, is sparking a conversation about the high cost of health care in the U.S. https://t.co/v0Smhl4XLA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 美国职业棒球大联盟（Major League Baseball）表示，已开始正式调查双向超级巨星大谷翔平（Shohei Ohtani）和他的翻译水原一平（Ippei Mizuhara）的丑闻：
item.description:
Major League Baseball says it has begun formally investigating the scandal involving two-way superstar Shohei Ohtani and his interpreter, Ippei Mizuhara.
